list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Cosmetic change
Added code to eliminate the Jobs folder to prevent 'job cannot be accessed by this engine' error, which happens when a job was interrupted and the project deleted before completing.
Re-disabled console screen when runnig Map Maker.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

task.summary: Default task
added open3d
added utm again
added utm again test
Added requirements for torch and cuda 11.8 as well as added the button for processing datasets using Neural Radiance Fields
Added requirements for torch and cuda 11.8 as well as added the button for processing datasets using Neural Radiance Fields
Added requirements for torch and cuda 11.8 as well as added the button for processing datasets using Neural Radiance Fields
Added requirements for torch and cuda 11.8 as well as added the button for processing datasets using Neural Radiance Fields
Started implementing Neural Surface Reconstruction Pipeline
Started implementing Neural Surface Reconstruction Pipeline
Started implementing Neural Surface Reconstruction Pipeline
Updated Neural Surface Reconstruction Pipeline
Updated Neural Surface Reconstruction Pipeline
Added functionality to close the iTwin engine on exit. cleaned up code.

Added functionality to close the iTwin engine on exit and as many background processes. Added folders for Lidar and NeuralRecon and updated paths accordingly. Added zip compression for SurfaceRecon mesh once finished Updated the mesh visualization pane to refresh every 5 seconds and display from Photogrammetry, Lidar and NeuralRecon Resized Main Map Maker Window for better aesthetics. Cleaned up code
TO DO
Include .xyz and prj files on zip Nerf zip file

Added functionality to close the iTwin engine on exit and as many background processes. Added folders for Lidar and NeuralRecon and updated paths accordingly. Added zip compression for SurfaceRecon mesh once finished Updated the mesh visualization pane to refresh every 5 seconds and display from Photogrammetry, Lidar and NeuralRecon Resized Main Map Maker Window for better aesthetics. Cleaned up code
TO DO
Include .xyz and prj files on zip Nerf zip file

Added functionality to close the iTwin engine on exit and as many background processes. Added folders for Lidar and NeuralRecon and updated paths accordingly. Added zip compresison for SurfaceRecon mesh once finished Updated the mesh visualization pane to refresh every 5 seconds and display from Photogrammetry, Lidar and NeuralRecon Resized Main Map Maker Window for better aesthetics. Cleaned up code
TO DO
Include .xyz and prj files on zip Nerf zip file Check how big can we tile a mesh on cesium to itigate LOD loss

Corrected compression algo to properly map zipped files. Added projection files (prj and xyz) to the zipped package.
TO DO
Fix decimation value Improve speed during Pose Triangulation. Improve resulting mesh quality

Finetuned output mesh with less decimation Added a frame refresh catch (destroy and respawn after 30 iterations) to avoid GUI form freezing with self.scrollable_label_button_frame.update() after n iterations. scrollable_label_button_frame becomes unresponsive and bleeds out onto the right corner of the screen. Increased Texture resolution to 4096
TO DO
Improve speed during Pose Triangulation. Improve resulting mesh quality
Finetuned output mesh with less decimation

Went back to scrollable_label_button_frame.destroy() since scrollable_label_button_frame.update() causes bleed after a long execution period. The GUI becomes unresponsive as well. Now updates on the right pane will be every 20 seconds.

Few cosmetic changes:
Messages generated from the child windows (neuralRecon, pc) will render fore screen instead of behind main window.
Corrected text on messagebox for those processes as well.

Cosmetic change
Added code to eliminate the Jobs folder to prevent 'job cannot be accessed by this engine' error, which happens when a job was interrupted and the project deleted before completing.
